short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore and Navigate your Google Docs with Ease! 🔍

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Nardium", the game-changing Chrome extension that revolutionizes the way you interact with your Google Docs. Get ready for a whole new level of productivity and organization! 🚀

⚡️ Seamless Navigation: 
Say goodbye to scrolling and endlessly searching your document. With Nardium, a simple and intuitive navigation window pops up on the left side of your Google Docs window, giving you instant access to all the different headings and hierarchies in your document. Navigate like a pro!

⚙️ Customize Your View: 
Tailor your document experience to suit your needs. Nardium empowers you to select which levels of headings are displayed, so you can focus on what matters most. Whether it's purely the highest level headings, right down to the tiniest detailed subheading, you can now easily navigate about.

🔍 Zoom In, Zoom Out: 
Nardium allows you to adjust the zoom level of the navigation panel so that you can set the font size just how you like it. No more straining your eyes or missing important sections.

⭐ Key Features: ⭐
✅ Intuitive Navigation: Effortlessly visualise and navigate your document's headings.
✅ Google Docs Integration: Nardium seamlessly integrates into your Google Docs workflow for a smooth experience.
✅ Customizable Display: Filter and display specific heading levels to customise what you see in the navigation panel.
✅ Zoom Functionality: Zoom in and out to specify the size of the text shown in the navigation panel.
✅ Dark theme: Switch to an eye-friendly dark theme for a comfortable editing experience, especially during late-night sessions.

Nardium allows you to seamlessly explore and navigate your document's hierarchy like never before. Add To Chrome now for a clear and streamlined editing experience. 💪💻
